message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm glad we're close to a deal, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can do a bit better than $125, so I'll offer it to you for $140.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not there yet. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $137.50, which is right in the middle of $130 and $140.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not sure if I can stretch to $137.50. I can do $135, and that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think about the product from John...

I can see you're getting a bit hesitant, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $137.50 again, but I'll throw in a small bonus to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. Can we meet at $137.50 with the bonus?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. To be honest, I'm starting to think that the product from John is a better deal. I'm going to have to pass on this offer. I'll just go with John's offer for $80. Thanks for the negotiation, Alice!
